attributes.action: Give the English population a referendum on preventing scottish MPs voting on ENGLISH political matters.
attributes.additional_details: You allowed thescottish to determine their own future.  That gives the English the right to determine if they are prepared to endure that Scottish MPs (who are paid the same as other MPs while having GREATLY reduced political responsibilities) have the right to determine their future whilehaving nothing to say over what happens to the few people who voted for them in Scotland!
